com.umeng.common.ui.adapters.viewholders

类 ViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.umeng.common.ui.adapters.viewholders.ViewHolder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ViewParser
    直接已知子类:
    ActiveUserViewHolder, CategoryViewHolder, FeedCommentViewHolder, FeedItemViewHolder, FollowedUserViewHolder, FollowedUserViewHolder, FriendItemViewHolder, ImagePickerGvViewHolder, ImageSelectedViewHolder, LikeUserViewHolder, MessageChatViewHolder, MessageSessionViewHolder, NotifyMsgViewHolder, ReceivedCommentViewHolder, RecommendTopicViewHolder, TopicViewHolder, UserViewHolder

    public abstract class ViewHolder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewParser
    ViewHolder抽象类,用于将ListView等列表视图的ViewHolder抽象画
